title: Alba Botanica Leave In Conditioner, 7-Ounce Tube (Pack of 2)
description: Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered natural, 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent natural, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair.

title: Oyin Handmade Hair Dew, Daily Quenching Hair Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
description: This creamy, conditioning leave-in is light enough for every day. It's great on 'naked' hair immediately after a cleanse, or as a way to reinvigorate tired hair all the way through your hair care cycle.
